title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Women's Ugly Christmas Sweaters Animal Christmas Tree Long Sleeve Cardigans Sweaters Button Down Open Front Knit

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #388,790 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,312 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Festive
items.body: Well made Christmas sweater. Runs true to size. Definitely recommend Read more
items.author: Jeanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute Holiday button down cardigan! Adorable and super warm!!
items.body: This sweater is really pretty and perfect for the upcoming holiday season!! It’s so cheery!! I am a size 4, 135lbs, and picked the Medium. Was the only size available but I like it being a bit oversized. Then I can wear a warm turtleneck underneath. It’s a bit big on me, but it still looks great!! My daughter is already saying she wants to steal it from my closet! It’s a typical cardigan with 4 buttons, so you can wear it open. It’s made of 100% Acrylic, it’s not super soft, but no pilling!! Major plus!! It’s like the ugly sweaters we always see in the stores, but this one is definitely not ugly! LOL I love the holiday designs, the snowflakes and the trees, it’s beautiful! Read more
items.author: Daisy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm Holiday Season Sweater
items.body: The FHRYYFAM Christmas sweater was ordered for my wife to wear during the holiday season. The sweater was received, and my wife almost immediately tried it on. My wife wears a medium size (which was ordered), and it fits her perfectly. She likes the color scheme, the woven patterns in the sweater, and the warmth it provides. The sweater is made of 100% acrylic, and although she prefers wool, she indicated that this material was warm and felt good on her arms. It was not particularly scratchy. The price is good for this type sweater, and I would order it again. Read more
items.author: Thomas Reed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, cute and warm!
items.body: This is such a cute Christmas sweater. I am someone who doesnt like traditional holiday wear but I do need something to wear to work during holiday themed days. This cardigan is perfect. The design is super cute without being tacky. The material is thick and super soft. If you are in between sizes, I would order up. It looks cute when chunky and oversized! Read more
items.author: JC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and warm, wish it had pockets
items.body: This Christmas sweater is surprisingly comfy and warm — not the usual itchy, novelty kind. It actually looks good too, better than most of the loud, over-the-top holiday sweaters out there. The only thing missing? Pockets. Add those, and it’d be perfect. Read more
items.author: Kristoffer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality, cute, comfy
items.body: This is an awesome, well made novelty cardigan. I am a small/medium and got a medium and it's nicely oversized. If you want it to just fit, maybe size down. It's a slightly heavier weight, so if you need to wear it for warmth it'll do the trick. Overall, really happy with this, exactly what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: C Lo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute Christmas sweater
items.body: This is a really cute Christmas sweater. It's a great v neck and the pattern is super cute. I can't wait to wear it for the holidays. I also like that it's a cardigan so I can wear it closed or open depending on how hot I am. Read more
items.author: mountainreader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This sweater is awesome for the price.
items.body: The color, pattern, and fit are all fantastic, and I got exactly what I expected here. It was easy to wear right outside the package with a bit of de-wrinkling with my hand, and I'm surprised at just how nice it all looks put together. Read more
items.author: Supplement

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red+green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
